text.title: DEFORMED ICE
text.body: Ice sheets are not still, but flow slowly like rivers. As the ice moves, the lowest layers are distorted and pick up dirt and rocks from the bedrock. The bottom layers of the GISP2 ice core are older than 110,000 yearsâ€”but deformation makes dating them impossible.
text.description: Edges of the Greenland Ice Sheet showing disturbed layers.
